page.title: 07The Woodyard, Boynton.
page.content: There is a small woodyard in Boynton which sells various kinds of wood. They sell things like sheets of hard board, sheets of half inch plywood and sheets of inch plywood and they sell timber like beanstakes,garden fence posts and thick pieces of wood for the roof.Quite a few people come to the woodyard.Some people come for very big orders of wood and some people only come for a few pieces.They store the wood in two big sheds.They have a one acre paddock as well which they store wood in. They have a tractor with which they cut the grass in the one acre paddock. They have a pickup and a trailer for carrying wood from one place to another. The pickup will hold one ton and the trailer will carry two tons.
